inclusion.criterion: LDL-C level greater than the NCEP goals as determined by patients' risk category
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Baseline lipid criteria: LDL-C = 100 to160 mg/dL (as calculated from Q1 and Q2 lipid results)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Compliance with medication dosing instructions during the single-blind placebo run-in period is 80% to 120%
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient claims mild dyspnea after climbing 3 floors, no dyspnea at rest and no angina (New York Heart Association class 2)

inclusion.criterion: Collect laboratory samples: Hematology/chemistry, Urine sample, Pregnancy test, Thyroid function tests
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Lab study is as bellow: FBS: 100 mg/dl, HbA1c: 6.5%, Cholesterol: 190 mg/dl, TG: 140 mg/dl

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is diagnosed with cardiomyopathy that will be treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers.

exclusion.criterion: History of thyroid disorders of any form within 24 weeks prior to study entry
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active liver disease and/or liver transaminases greater than 1.5 X upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 25-year-old man with type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago.
